document.full_text: former president jimmy carter said on tuesday he hoped to contribute to better u.s.-cuba relations, but was not in cuba seeking the release of a u.s. aid contractor whose imprisonment has blocked better ties between the cold war-era enemies.
document.title: carter says he hopes to improve u.s.-cuba ties
lines_and_colors: former president jimmy carter said on tuesday he hoped to contribute to better u.s.-cuba relations, but was not in cuba seeking the release of a u.s. aid contractor whose imprisonment has blocked better ties between the cold war-era enemies.
